2021-01-10 retro

Look back at fragments of the week

Conspiracy theorists' image of 5G Covid implant chip turns out to be guitar pedal schematic.

First day back at work and Slack falls over.

Is Japan building wooden satellites the pre-cursor of Alien 3's original wooden planet setting?

Brick collecting, of course.

Test your knowledge with this UX Quiz from The NNGroup.

Secret artists creating shops for mice across Europe.

A good piece by Kieran Healy around what happened at The Capitol on the 6th.
